content:
Seven invaders were killed and 6 more were injured in the destruction of the Signi Kotov patrol ship.

About thisinformsMain Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

According to preliminary data, as a result of attack on the patrol ship "Sergey Kotov", which led to the destruction of the vessel, the loss of the crew of Russian invaders is:

  • 7 - irreversible;
  • 6 - sanitary.

The department added that 52 crew members who were on the ship were likely to be evacuated by the enemy.

"It seems that saved and stunned sailors of" Sergey Kotov "due to the loss of the vessel" will "matrose" Russian special services "," Gur emphasized.

As reported by the Armyinform, GURPosted a videoDestruction in the temporarily occupied Crimea of the Russian patrol ship "Sergey Kotov".

We will remind, GUR interception:“Kotov” was attacked by 5 beams.I don’t know how they fought with them for 40 minutes. ”
title: GUR told how many occupiers went to the bottom with "Sergey Kotov"
description: The Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine informs about it. As noted, according to ...
author: Army Inform
